data.title: Mobile Video Gaming Theater Parties – Akron, Canton & Cleveland OH – Inflatables & Mobile Video Game Parties – Cleveland, Akron, Canton, OH – Bounce House Rental
data.text:
Mobile Video Gaming Theater Parties – Akron, Canton & Cleveland OH

AKRON MOBILE VIDEO GAME TRUCK

$395 For 2 Hours Of Gameplay

$75 For Each Additional 1/2 Hour

$49 For Digital Photo Booth Add-on

$99 for Printable Photo Add-on

CLEVELAND MOBILE VIDEO GAME TRUCK

UPDATED VR FOR 2022!

FEATURING PS5, XBOX SERIES X, AND NINTENDO SWITCH ON ALL CLEVELAND TRUCKS!

$389 For 2 Hours Of Gameplay

$75 For Each Additional 1/2 Hour

$49 For Digital Photo Booth Add-on

$99 For Printable Photo Booth Add-On

$49 For VR Add-on

CLEVELAND VIDEO GAME TRUCK

Ohio Mobile Gaming’s “Cleveland Video Gaming Theater” is truly one-of-a-kind, equipped with (5) TV’s and a digital photo booth ($49). For $99, you can choose to have your pictures printed as well! Our self-contained ‘party in a truck’ supports 16-20 players simultaneously. Ask an OMG representative to help customize your party based upon the age and size of your group. Multiple items are discounted based upon your event needs.

PRICING

AKRON GAME TRUCK

Our Akron Mobile Video Game Theater services Summit, Stark, Medina, Portage & Wayne Counties. In 2019 we added an outdoor TV and gaming station, new 3000w sound system inside and out, upgraded our lighting and added a full photo booth inside! OMG Akron accommodates up to 20 people at a time (16 inside) and features the Xbox One, Xbox 360, PS4 and Nintendo Wii.

PRICING

Self Contained

On-board generators supply all needed power

HVAC units along with a fully insulated shell provide comfortable conditions in any climate

No need for anything other than a place to park the game truck for the duration of the event!

Fully Networked

Full Networked XBox 360’s, XBox One, Nintendo Wii, and Sony PS4’s

Up to 16 players can compete in one game simultaneously

Up to 20 players can play simultaneously

Professional sound systems are linked together for the ultimate experience during simultaneous gameplay

Loaded With Features

Over-the-top sound systems with powered sub-woofers inside and out

Interior stand-up gaming area for Wii and Kinect (Akron Truck)

All The Newest Game Releases

We will bring EVERY game we have…which is a LOT! Some examples of popular games are shown below, but we have many, many more.

First Player Shooters : Halo, Call of Duty Series, etc

Family Fun: Minecraft, Wii Sports, Just Dance, Lego Series, The Voice, Roblox etc

Sports: Wii Bowling, Madden, Gran Turismo, 2K Sports Series
